notes: Beautifully designed modern apartment on the top floor (14F) of a newer high-rise complex with elevator. The interior features a stylish open-plan layout with designer kitchen (green cabinets, quartz countertops, patterned tile floors), abundant hanging plants, and a raised living area with large windows offering panoramic views. Baby safety concerns include a raised platform/step between the dining and living areas with small LED step lights, a ladder visible near shelving, and the kitchen island with bar stools; the balcony access door is large floor-to-ceiling glass. Excellent natural light from multiple windows on both sides, very clean and well-maintained condition â€” a premium listing at a premium price.
